A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great movie. Some assholes will be disappointed because Rian Johnson didn't make what they wanted him to\, but it was fresh and left a lot of questions for future films. People seem to forget it took a couple decades to get the \"prequels\" that added all the backstory to the old trilogy. This was the first one that made me feel like a kid watching a movie again. It was enjoyable!
